D

defineLayout(Graph) - Static method in class Embeddings.CircularEmbedding
Aligns the nodes of a graph G on a circle in the unit square according to a circular embedding.
defineLayout(Graph) - Static method in class Embeddings.GridEmbedding
Aligns the nodes of a Graph on a regular grid within the unit square.
defineLayout(Graph, int) - Static method in class Embeddings.GridEmbedding
Aligns the nodes of a Graph on a regular grid within the unit square.
defineLayout(Graph) - Static method in class Embeddings.LayeredEmbedding
Aligns the nodes of a graph G on horizontal layers in the unit square such that (almost) all edges of G show downwards.
defineLayout(Graph) - Static method in class Embeddings.LinearEmbedding
Aligns the nodes of a graph G on a horizontal line in the unit square.
defineLayout(Graph) - Static method in class Embeddings.RandomEmbedding
Aligns the nodes of a graph G randomly in the unit square.
defineLayout(Graph, int) - Static method in class Embeddings.SpectralEmbedding
Aligns the nodes of a graph G according to a spectral embedding.
defineLayout(Graph, int, int) - Static method in class Embeddings.SpringEmbedding
Aligns the nodes of a Graph G either within in the unit square, or within the unit cube.
defineLayout2D(Graph) - Static method in class Embeddings.SpectralEmbedding
Aligns the nodes of a graph G according to a spectral embedding in 2 dimensions (in the unit square).
defineLayout2D(Graph) - Static method in class Embeddings.SpringEmbedding
Aligns the nodes of a Graph G either within in the unit square, according to a force-based layout algorithm.
defineLayout3D(Graph) - Static method in class Embeddings.SpectralEmbedding
Aligns the nodes of a graph G according to a spectral embedding in 3 dimensions (in the unit cube).
defineLayout3D(Graph) - Static method in class Embeddings.SpringEmbedding
Aligns the nodes of a Graph G either within in the unit cube, according to a force-based layout algorithm.
degreeMatrix(Graph) - Static method in class Embeddings.SpectralEmbedding
Computes the degree matrix of the Graph G.
dimension - Variable in class Graph.Vector
Specifies the dimension of the space where this vector should live in.

distance(double[], double[]) - Static method in class Embeddings.SpringEmbedding
Returns the Euclidean distance between two points.
distance - Variable in class Graph.Node3D
A number that corresponds to the distance of this node to a plane determined by the two vectors X and Y (which are always normal to each other) and the origin of the coordinate system.
distanceToNode(Node, double, double, double) - Static method in class GraphDrawing.GraphDrawer
Computes the distance of a node to a certain point (x,y) where the node as well as the point (x,y) are located in a square with length size.
dotProduct(Vector, Vector) - Static method in class Graph.Vector
Calculates and returns the dot product of two vectors.
